title: I cant buy the new champion
body: I have 7848 ip, yet i still cant buy her, Whats up riot?

replies.body:
It sounds like the New Client may be having issues grabbing your correct IP balance. Try swapping over to the Legacy Client from the login screen to make your purchase.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this worked!

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=94JBxBnd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-13T05:46:52.650+0000)
>
> It sounds like the New Client may be having issues grabbing your correct IP balance. Try swapping over to the Legacy Client from the login screen to make your purchase.
> 
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg
> 
> Let me know if this worked!

Thanks riot!! It worked.
nothing happens when I click the Launch legacy client, it just closes everything.
